sentences.en: A safety lockout mechanism restricts unauthorized or unintended operation.
sentences.cn: 安全锁定系统,防止擅自操作或误操作.

sentences.en: All taxes have unintended consequences. One must be particularly careful with this one.
sentences.cn: 所有的税种都会带来意想不到的后果, 对于这一税种,我们必须格外小心.

sentences.en: Any step away from this principle will create distortions, with unintended consequences.
sentences.cn: 任何偏离这一原则的举动,都会造成扭曲, 带来意外后果.

sentences.en: As you set keys, you often create many unintended keys.
sentences.cn: 作为你设置帧, 你通常创建许多没用的帧.

sentences.en: However, I am also troubled by the possible unintended negative consequences.
sentences.cn: 然而, 我也被因特网可能带来的意外的不良后果困扰.

sentences.en: However, this approach does not protect your more sensitive an unintended PHP files against access.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这个方法不能防御访问你敏感的PHP文件.

sentences.en: In video systems , something unnatural or unintended observed reproduction of an image by the system.
sentences.cn: 在视频系统中, 图象重显时观察到的反常的或非有意安排的某些东西.

sentences.en: Primary outcomes were neurologic status, unintended secondary procedures, complications, and kyphosis angle.
sentences.cn: 初期的疗效包括神经系统状况 、 非预期的二次手术 、 并发症及脊柱后凸角度.

sentences.en: Short Circuit A short circuit is generally an unintended electrical connection between current carrying parts.
sentences.cn: 短路短路通常是指带电流的组件之间意外的电路连接.

sentences.en: The climate problem is the unintended consequence of our success.
sentences.cn: 人类取得了成功,却带来了未预见到的气候问题.

sentences.en: The hackneyed phrase came unintended to his lips.
sentences.cn: 他顺口说了这句老掉牙的套话。

sentences.en: They can also be unintended caches such as at Pompeii.
sentences.cn: 他们也可以是随意的容器,就像在庞培古城一样.

sentences.en: This can increase the risk of referring to an unintended version of a shadowed variable.
sentences.cn: 这可能会增加引用被隐藏变量的非预期版本的危险.

sentences.en: Too often they have unintended consequences, helping to create the next disaster.
sentences.cn: 采取更多的监管往往会产生意想不到的后果, 促使下一场灾难的发生.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, there was an unintended consequence of the successful purge of cockroaches.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 清除蟑螂带来了意想不到的后果.

trans.tran_en: Unintended results were not planned to happen, although they happened
